Toothbrush with built-in GPS tracking: The toothbrush can track the user's brushing habits and provide feedback on their oral hygiene. The GPS tracking feature can help users monitor their brushing time and ensure they are brushing for the recommended two minutes.

Toothbrush with a built-in tongue cleaner: The toothbrush can have a built-in tongue cleaner that removes bacteria and freshens breath. This feature can help improve oral health and prevent bad breath.

Toothbrush with a smartphone app: The toothbrush can have a smartphone app that connects to the toothbrush and tracks the user's brushing habits. The app can provide personalized feedback on the user's brushing technique and offer tips for improving oral hygiene.

Toothbrush with a built-in timer: The toothbrush can have a built-in timer that alerts the user when it's time to switch to a new quadrant. This feature can help users brush for the recommended two minutes and ensure they cover all areas of their mouth.

Toothbrush with a built-in pressure sensor: The toothbrush can have a built-in pressure sensor that alerts the user if they are brushing too hard. This feature can help prevent tooth enamel erosion and improve oral health.
